name: Minors
description:
Minors is a cooperative game about the reality of child labor in the mining industry done in 10 weeks for the Ubisoft Game Lab 2018 competition.

You will have to cooperate with your brother in order to pick up the minerals and transform them to reach the weekly multinational's quota. The goal is to gather money to sustain the villager's needs.

The team

Alex Battista, Lydiane Beaulne-Bélisle, Nicolas Crevier, Delyan Farashev, William Homs, Sijia Mao, Félix Libérali, Eva-Léa Longue Ngambi

Spécial thanks to Léandre Monette for being an amazing composer/sound designer!
